#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int main()
{
    ll t,e,o,v;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%lld %lld",&e,&o);
        v=abs(3*e-2*o);
        if(v%5==0)
        {
            v/=5;
            printf("%lld\n",v);
        }
        else
        printf("-1\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
